title: It Happened One Night
description: A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.

title: The Thin Man
description: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

title: It's a Gift
description: A henpecked grocer decides to follow his dream of owning an orange grove in California, despite the objections of his family.

title: The Black Cat
description: American honeymooners in Hungary are trapped in the home of a Satan-worshipping priest when the bride is taken for a ritual.

title: Twentieth Century
description: A temperamental Broadway director tries to win back the actress he made a star, who is now a Hollywood diva.

title: L'Atalante
description: A young woman marries the captain of a canal barge and struggles to adjust to life on the water.

title: The Gay Divorcee
description: A woman mistakes a dancer for the co-respondent in her divorce case.

title: Of Human Bondage
description: A club-footed artist falls in obsessive love with a sluttish waitress who abuses his kindness.

title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
description: A man and his wife receive a clue to an assassination plot, but their child is kidnapped to ensure their silence.

title: The Scarlet Empress
description: A German princess is selected to marry the dim-witted Grand Duke Peter of Russia and eventually rises to power as Catherine the Great.

title: Tarzan and His Mate
description: The idyllic life of Tarzan and Jane is threatened when men from civilization return to the jungle.

title: Manhattan Melodrama
description: Childhood friends Blackie Gallagher and Jim Wade grow up on opposite sides of the law.

title: Imitation of Life
description: A struggling widow and her African-American housekeeper find success in the pancake business, but face personal difficulties with their daughters.

title: Babes in Toyland
description: Ollie Dee and Stanley Dum try to borrow money from their employer, the toymaker, to pay off the mortgage on Mother Peep's shoe and keep Little Bo Peep from the clutches of the evil Barnaby.

title: The Count of Monte Cristo
description: After greedy men have Edmon Dantes unjustly imprisoned for 20 years for innocently delivering a letter entrusted to him, he escapes to get his revenge on them.

title: Treasure Island
description: Young Jim Hawkins is torn between his loyalty to his benefactors and his affection for lovable rogue Long John Silver in their struggle to recover a buried pirate treasure.

title: The Lost Patrol
description: A World War I British Army patrol is stranded in the Mesopotamian desert and being picked off one by one by unseen Arab snipers.

title: Viva Villa!
description: Mexican revolutionary Pancho Villa fights to oust the tyrannical regime in Mexico.

title: The Barretts of Wimpole Street
description: The invalid poet Elizabeth Barrett lives in terror of her tyrannical father, until she falls in love with the dashing poet Robert Browning.

title: The Merry Widow
description: A prince from a small kingdom courts a wealthy widow to keep her money in the country.

title: Les Misérables
description: Jean Valjean, a man imprisoned for stealing bread, tries to lead a normal life after his release but is pursued by a ruthless policeman.

title: Judge Priest
description: A small-town judge in 1890 Kentucky plays matchmaker for his nephew and battles a rival in an upcoming election.

title: Death Takes a Holiday
description: Death decides to take a holiday from his usual business to see what it is like to be a mortal.

title: Our Daily Bread
description: A city couple inherits a farm during the Depression and turns it into a socialist collective with other unemployed workers.

title: Little Miss Marker
description: A bookie finds himself looking after a little girl left as an IOU for a gambling debt.

title: Bright Eyes
description: An orphaned girl is caught in a custody battle between her godfather and a crotchety old man.

title: Dames
description: A songwriter and a director try to put on a show, but their rich backer wants to censor it.

title: Cleopatra
description: The story of the Egyptian queen who seduced two Roman rulers: Julius Caesar and Mark Antony.

title: The House of Rothschild
description: The story of the rise of the Rothschild family of bankers, from their humble beginnings to financing the Napoleonic Wars.

title: One Night of Love
description: An aspiring opera singer goes to Italy to study, where she meets a demanding teacher who helps her achieve fame.

title: The Painted Veil
description: A neglected wife accompanies her scientist husband to China, where she falls in love with another man.

title: Broadway Bill
description: A man leaves his unhappy marriage and job to race his beloved horse, Broadway Bill, with the help of his sister-in-law.

title: Jimmy the Gent
description: An unethical geneology researcher tries to win back his former girlfriend by pretending to be a gentleman.

title: Fog Over Frisco
description: A spoiled socialite gets involved with stolen securities and a murder mystery in San Francisco.

title: Belle of the Nineties
description: A burlesque performer moves to New Orleans and gets mixed up with a prizefighter and a crook.

title: Flirtation Walk
description: A soldier falls for a general's daughter, but their romance is threatened by military regulations and class differences.

title: Here Comes the Navy
description: A construction worker joins the Navy to get back at a petty officer he dislikes, but learns discipline and camaraderie.

title: Men in White
description: A dedicated young doctor is torn between his demanding career and his wealthy fiancée.

title: Chained
description: A woman falls in love with a rancher while on a cruise, but feels obligated to marry her wealthy, older lover.

title: Forsaking All Others
description: A woman is left at the altar by her fiancé, but a longtime friend steps in to help her pick up the pieces.

title: The White Parade
description: The lives and loves of student nurses in a large hospital.

title: Evelyn Prentice
description: A neglected wife has an affair with a gigolo who blackmails her, leading to murder and a trial where her husband is the defense attorney.

title: Wonder Bar
description: The owner of a Paris nightclub gets involved in the tangled love lives of his performers and patrons.

title: Fashions of 1934
description: A con man steals fashion designs from Paris to sell in New York, but gets caught up in a musical revue.

title: Bulldog Drummond Strikes Back
description: Bulldog Drummond gets involved in a mystery surrounding a disappearing body and a kidnapped girl.

title: The Cat's-Paw
description: A missionary's son returns to his hometown and accidentally becomes mayor, cleaning up corruption with Eastern philosophy.

title: The Old Fashioned Way
description: A con man leads a troupe of actors through a series of misadventures while trying to stay ahead of the law.

title: Search for Beauty
description: Two Olympic swimmers are duped into endorsing a sleazy health magazine.

title: Six of a Kind
description: A couple on a road trip pick up a quirky pair of hitchhikers, leading to comedic chaos.

title: Mandalay
description: A woman stranded in Burma is forced into a shady nightclub job by her lover, leading to a desperate escape.

title: The Goddess
description: A young mother turns to prostitution to support her son, but society's judgment and a ruthless pimp threaten their future.

title: A Story of Floating Weeds
description: An actor returns to a small town with his troupe and reunites with his former lover and their illegitimate son.
